definitions.definition: Any fungus in the genus Claviceps which are parasitic on grasses .
The sclerotium (wintering stage) of certain fungi in the genus Claviceps , appearing as a deformed grain in certain cereals and grasses infected by the fungi.
The wart-like growth of skin that covers the metacarpal pad on a horse or similar animal.

main_definition: Any fungus in the genus Claviceps which are parasitic on grasses .
secondary_definitions: The sclerotium (wintering stage) of certain fungi in the genus Claviceps , appearing as a deformed grain in certain cereals and grasses infected by the fungi.
The wart-like growth of skin that covers the metacarpal pad on a horse or similar animal.
